text: Cinderella is a 2015 romantic-fantasy movie. It stars Lily James as Cinderella. Cate Blanchett plays Lady Tremaine. Helena Bonham Carter plays the Fairy Godmother. The movie was released on March 13, 2015. ==References== Category:2015 romance movies Category:2015 fantasy movies Category:2010s American romance movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:British romance movies Category:British fantasy movies Category:Disney movie remakes Category:Movies directed by Kenneth Branagh Category:Movies about fairies and sprites Category:Movies about royalty Category:Movies about weddings Category:Movies about wish fulfillment Category:Movies set in castles
title: Cinderella (2015 movie)
